enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
sentences: The conclusions (FCCC/KP/CMP/2005/L.4) note Italy`s submission on this matter (FCCC/KP/CMP/2005/MISC.2), request SBSTA to consider the request and forward a draft decision for adoption at COP/MOP 2.
The conclusions also request Italy to submit country-specific data to the Secretariat in a timely manner so as to facilitate SBSTA`s discussions.
